# NSButton.BezelStyle

**Enumeration**

The set of bezel styles to style buttons in your app.

## Declaration

```swift
enum BezelStyle
```

## Overview

For design guidance on buttons, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/buttons].

## Default

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.automatic**: The default button style based on the button’s contents and position within the window.

## Push

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.push**: A standard push style button.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.flexiblePush**: A push button with a flexible height to accommodate longer text labels or an image.

## Disclosure

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.disclosure**: A bezel style button for use with a disclosure triangle.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.pushDisclosure**: A bezel style push button with a disclosure triangle.

## Toolbar

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.toolbar**: A button style that’s appropriate for a toolbar item.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.accessoryBar**: A button style that’s typically used in the context of an accessory toolbar for buttons that narrow the focus of a search or other operation.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.accessoryBarAction**: A button style that you use for extra actions in an accessory toolbar.

## Informational

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.helpButton**: A round button with a question mark, providing the standard help button look.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.badge**: A button style suitable for displaying additional information.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.circular**: A round button that can contain either a single character or an icon.

## Other

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.smallSquare**: A simple square bezel style that can scale to any size.

## Deprecated

- **Deprecated Symbols**

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.glass**: A bezel style with a glass effect

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NSButton.ButtonType**: Button types that you can specify using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSButtonCell/setButtonType(_:)].
- **NSButton.GradientType**: Specify the gradients used by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSButtonCell/gradientType] property.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
